Hybrid Journals: Venues Metadata

Source: R/data.R
jct_oalex_venues.Rd

This datasets contains information about journals. These journals come from the Journal Checker Tool.

Usage

jct_oalex_venues

Format

An object of class tbl_df (inherits from tbl, data.frame) with 12966 rows and 3 columns.

Examples

jct_oalex_venues
#> # A tibble: 13,183 × 3
#>    issn_l    display_name                                           homepage_url
#>    <chr>     <chr>                                                  <chr>       
#>  1 2211-8330 Journal of Religion in Japan                           NA          
#>  2 2154-4611 Asian Journal of Law and Economics                     NA          
#>  3 2251-2373 Journal of Molecular and Engineering Materials         NA          
#>  4 1871-529X Cardiovascular &amp; Hematological Disorders-Drug Tar… NA          
#>  5 2093-7660 Korea-Australia Rheology Journal                       NA          
#>  6 2754-124X Transactions in Earth, Environment, and Sustainability NA          
#>  7 2832-5516 Games: Research and Practice                           NA          
#>  8 1569-1322 Comparative Sociology                                  NA          
#>  9 2639-0175 Digital Government: Research and Practice              NA          
#> 10 2044-124X Built Environment Project and Asset Management         NA          
#> # ℹ 13,173 more rows
